name.description: Project name; Will be used as alias name for all project sources

entry.description: Absolute path to application entry point class file path; Must provide a default export

src.description: Absolute path to directory with application sources; Will be aliased as project name

dist.description: Absolute path to output directory; Build artifacts will be put here

name.description: Entity name; Not used for any purposes whatsoever

css.description: File paths to CSS files to be bundled via PostCSS

externalCss.description: URIs of CSS files to be included as link references

modules.description: File paths to JS module files to be compiled

inlineScripts.description: File paths to JS scripts to be inlined into html via `<script>` tags

externalScripts.description: URIs of JS scripts to be included as link references

static.description: Map of extra static files to be included into build; Key: web path, value: file system path

aliases.description: Map of modules aliases; Key: alias name, value: File system path to its root

postcss.title: PostCSS options
postcss.description: Configures CSS files processing and bundling

importEntryPoints.description: CSS @import entry point, if not set imports will not be processed

filePlugins.description: Any additional plugin instances that will be run against each file. Also run by dev server.

bundlePlugins.description: Any additional plugin instances that will be run against resulting CSS bundle. Not run by dev server

backdoor.description: Path to a JS module file that will be include in dev server only

gcc.description:
[Closure Compiler flags](https://github.com/google/closure-compiler/wiki/Flags-and-Options).
Some flags (`--js`, `--externs` et al.) are set internally by ZombieBox,
overriding them might break everything.

include.description: Resources, source and other files for additional entities (libraries, extra scripts and static files)

aliases.description: A map of any additional aliases

additionalProperties.description: Key: alias name, value: Absolute file system path to directory with modules

define.description: Compilation time defines that will be added as runtime constants

skipVersionsCheck.description: Skip ZombieBox components peerDependencies compatibility check, false by default

generatedCode.description: Absolute path to directory that will contain code generated in runtime

templates.description: Directories to search for server-side templates for (used in scaffolding)
